channel.title: Rye Straws on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Rye Straws on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Still Grasping At Straws
item.description: Hey all, with all the recent chatter about straws in the news of late, we thought it would be a good idea to bring back this piece on the topicâ€”with some sizable updates, of course. Cheers! Today in Tedium: The plastic straw is a simple invention with relatively modest value: For a few moments, the device helps make beverages easier to drink. And then, due to reasons of sanitation and ease of use, the straws are thrown away, never to be seen again.
